verbs.description: [ARG0: Former Kansas City Chiefs linebacker Tamba Hali] [V: spoke] out [ARGM-LOC: on Twitter] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [ARG1: about President Donald Trump and the issue of NFL players standing for the National Anthem] .
Former Kansas City Chiefs linebacker Tamba Hali spoke out on Twitter Wednesday about President Donald Trump and the issue of [ARG1: NFL players] [V: standing] [ARGM-PRP: for the National Anthem] .
